body.p:
Owingsville Ky
May 6th 1862.
To His Excellency
B. Magoffin
Frankfort Ky --
Dear Governor --

About the 10th of last June you ^gave^ Harrison Cofer a respite of 12 months upon a fine obtained against him in the Bath Circuit Court. The Petition was presented by myself -- Mr Cofer had since that time puchased a small tract of land and in a great measure reformed his character -- and I think he will now continue to do better.
I think this case pres^e^nts a case where your interposition would be safely and profitably exercised --

Your friend very Truly --
R. Gudgell
